div.ab: One who is wounded: Take a bowl with with rainworms and wash it pure and clean with water and then put them in a flax cloth and press on it fully, so that water runs through the cloth. And take an angster (vessel with a narrow neck) with olive oil, and put it in a kettle, and put the worms also in there, and let the oil fully boil until it (???) that the worms have come apart like cracklings(???), and then take take a white, clean cloth and put the oil through it.
